sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from 'src/app/interfaces/project'; import { ProjectService } from 'src/app/services/project/project.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent implements OnInit { projects!: Project[]; pageNo=0; constructor(public projectsService:ProjectService) { } async ngOnInit(): Promise { this.projects = await this.projectsService.getProjects(this.pageNo).toPromise(); } public async nextProjects(){ if(this.projects.length!=0){ console.warn("click called"); this.pageNo+=1; this.projects = await this.projectsService.getProjects(this.pageNo).toPromise(); } } public async previousProjects(){ if(this.pageNo!==0){ this.pageNo-=1; console.warn("click called"); this.projects = await this.projectsService.getProjects(this.pageNo).toPromise(); } } }
